commit.message:
c-parse.in (string): For -Wtraditional, warn about string concatenation only once per line.

	* c-parse.in (string): For -Wtraditional, warn about string
	concatenation only once per line.

From-SVN: r35290

files.patch:

+	concatenation only once per line.
